Class MP3_Library

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--MP3_Library
public class MP3_Library
extends java.lang.Object

An MP3 Library is a collection of MP3 files and information about them. The class provides static methods for verifying that a File is a valid Queens College MP3 Library file and for creating a new library file. A library file consists of text lines, the first of which must be the magic word, "#QCMP3LIB." Other lines are the complete pathname of the file. A MP3_Libary object augments each file with information extracted from the first MPEG audio frame in the file, plus any ID3 tag information found in the file.

Version:
3.0 - November 1999
Author:
C. Vickery
